overview:
Alyn V. Essman is the retired Chairman and CEO of CPI Corporation (NYSE:CPY). An accountant by training, Essman ran CPI curing an explosive growth period and now as BusyEvent is about to enter such a phase, Alyn has stepped in to the role of CEO of the company.

A distinguished alumna of Washington University in St. Louis, he lead a senior management acquisition and then the companyâ€™s IPO in 1982.

Alyn has served on various community boards such as the St Louis Science Center, Webster University, Barnes Jewish Hospital and United Way as well as past service on boards of the St. Louis Symphony Society, Downtown St. Louis Inc., St. Louis Jewish Federation and others.

As CEO, Alyn will concentrate on finance and administrative support of planning, guidance and opportunities for strategic growth.
